description: have no any tools for comic creation
summary: fake... this is not creator... only reader

description: To the creator: I think you are on the verge of creating a good app with this. But the buttons to remove a page or change it's position stay up for a split second when I move the cursor over a particular page. So I can't change the position or remove pages once they are in the book. I like the meta-data feature that gives the creator a stepping stone to picking a genre and naming characters to get the ball rolling.
